titles.title: Department of Veterans Affairs Therapeutic Medical Physicist Pay Cap Relief Act of 2026
Department of Veterans Affairs Therapeutic Medical Physicist Pay Cap Relief Act of 2026

A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to codify the requirements for appointment, qualifications, and pay for the therapeutic medical physicists of the Department of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
